meanings.definition: A wooden stick or staff used as a support or prop.
meanings.sent1: The farmer leaned on a sturdy jackstaves while watching over his crops.
meanings.sent2: She used a jackstaves to help her walk through the rocky terrain.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel thought the jackstaves was a tree and tried to climb it.
meanings.sent4: His determination was the jackstaves that held up his spirit during tough times.
meanings.sent5: The old man carved his memories into the jackstaves of his walking stick.

meanings.definition: A type of musical instrument consisting of a wooden staff with metal keys that are struck to produce sound.
meanings.sent1: The musician played a beautiful melody on the jackstaves at the concert.
meanings.sent2: Children gathered around to listen to the enchanting tunes of the jackstaves.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat tried to catch the notes as they rang out from the jackstaves.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter echoed like the sweet sound of the jackstaves in the quiet room.
meanings.sent5: The music teacher showed the students how to play the jackstaves with precision.
